title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, Mortgage Banks, Supervisory Procedure 103 - Application for a Change in Control of a Mortgage Banker
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, Mortgage Banks, Supervisory Procedure 103 - Application for a Change in Control of a Mortgage Banker

State Regulations
§ 103.1 - General information, version 3
§ 103.2 - Application forms and assistance, version 3
§ 103.3 - Definitions, version 2
§ 103.4 - Information and documents required to be submitted, version 2

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, Mortgage Banks, Supervisory Procedure 103

Statutory authority: Banking Law, §§ 12, 594-b

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
